document_data.name: Silaha Mnunzi
document_data.mainbody:
'''Silaha Mnunzi''' was a weapon buyer in service to the [[Port Nyanzaru#Merchant Princes|merchant prince]] [[Ekene-Afa]] of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|[[Steel]] is as varied as smiths who work it, and the many nations they hail from. Show me your best steel, show me something we must have.|Silaha Mnunzi}}
document_data.Personality: She was brusque in her business dealings.
document_data.Activities:
Silaha acquired weapons on behalf of her merchant prince, who by law controlled all trade in weapons within Port Nyanzaru. This meant that foreign weapons dealers or [[blacksmith]]s were advised to seek her out and impress her if they wished to sell their wares in the city.

Silaha imported a great deal of weapons from lands [[Sword Coast|north of Chult]]. She also worked alongside the [[Tearah Initoo|Master of the Market]] to seek out skilled or notable smiths who visited Port Nyanzaru.
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Silaha was seeking a smith to produce [[axe]]s, [[lance]]s, and [[sword]]s of [[titansteel]].
